comment: Lectures got boring especially when related to the army or sports. BUT he gets the information to you clearly. 5 tests, 1 quiz, 1 group project, 2 discussion posts. Very simple work load, I would take him again.

Professor T was one of the best professors I have ever had! He is willing to help with anything, and truly cares about you and your success. If you have a chance to take him, you should. Class is super easy, show up and do the work and you will be fine. Highly Recommend!!!!

Dr. T is a phenomenal professor. His lectures were well-crafted, extremely informative, and conducive to actual learning of the material. He responded to all emails quickly and addressed all course concerns promptly. Best professor I've ever had the pleasure of learning from him.

One of my favorite professors; he cares about his students and their grades! The lectures are not boring at all. There are two group projects, online quizzes, and three exams. I highly recommend taking this professor for any of the classes he teaches. I learned so much and have never enjoyed coming to a class as much as I did.
